title: Lily James shows off her figure in a sexy thigh-high split dress for Rare Beasts premiere in London
text:
She is one of the most stunning stars in the business.

And Lily James looked sensational as she attended the UK premiere for her new movie Rare Beasts during the 63rd BFI London Film Festival at The Curzon Mayfair, London on Thursday night.

The actress, 30, showed off her slender figure in a skintight yellow floral dress which boasted a thigh-high split.

Fashionista: Lily James attended the UK premiere for her new movie Rare Beasts during the 63rd BFI London Film Festival at The Curzon Mayfair, London on Thursday night

Lily oozed glamour in the number which boasted a slight turtleneck and midi-length sleeves.

The racy split of the dress showed off her toned legs which she boosted in a pair of towering black strappy heels.

Her brunette locks were piled into a high topknot, with a few loose tendrils framing her striking features.

Lily opted for a simple slick of make-up, complete with matte lipstick and black eyeliner.

Stylish: The actress, 30, showed off her slender figure in a skintight yellow floral dress which boasted a thigh-high split

Looking good: Lily oozed glamour in the number which boasted a slight turtleneck and midi-length sleeves

Saucy: The racy split of the dress showed off her toned legs which she boosted in a pair of towering black strappy heels - posing with Billie Piper

The beauty takes on the role of Cassandra in the comedy drama Rare Beasts, which is written and directed by Billie Piper.

The movie also features Leo Bill, Kerry Fox, Toby Woolf and David Thewliss.

Billie plays Mandy - a modern woman raising a son in the midst of a female revolution, mining the pain of her parents separation and professionally writing about a love that no longer exists.

Pretty: Lily opted for a simple slick of make-up, complete with matte lipstick and black eyeliner

Portrayal: The beauty takes on the role of Cassandra in the comedy drama Rare Beasts, which is written and directed by Billie Piper

Glam: Billie looked sensational in a skin-baring black dress, which accentuated her incredible physique, layered with a busty bra and high-waisted knickers

The plot sees her come across a troubled man, Pete, who’s searching for a sense of worth, belonging and ‘restored’ male identity. Billie has also directed the film.

She said of it: 'Rare Beasts is a cautionary tale. Where do we all go after the fallout between men and women? And Who do we really need at the end of it all?

'I’ve been longing to talk dramatically about the world I see around me and ultimately, I’ve always wanted to make my own films. This is a wonderful moment.'
